content: Ken Christensen - Professor Ken Christensen Professor and Associate Dean of Academic Affairs Bellini College of AI, Cybersecurity and Computing University of South Florida 4202 East Fowler Avenue, ENG 030 Tampa, Florida 33620 Office: ENB 319 (map) Phone: (813) 974-4761 Email: christen@cse.usf.edu Office hours: By appointment (send email - in-person or Teams meetings are welcome) [ Teaching | Research | Service ] [ CV | Bio ] [ Tools | Links ] Teaching In spring 2026 I am teaching: CIS 4910 -- Senior Project CNT 5008 -- Computer Network Essentials Research My research interests are at the intersection of networks and energy in the area of energy-efficient computing and communications systems, and the application of communications to improving the storage, distribution, and use of energy in small grids. My Google Scholar page is here. My grants, publications, and patents are: Grants Publications Patents My current graduate students are: Molud Esmali My previous graduate students are here. Service Founding member and President of The Pledge of the Computing Professional ABET EAC Program Evaluator Member of ACM Committee on Professional Ethics (COPE) Advisory Board member for International Journal of Network Management Program committee member for several conferences and workshops Reviewer for many journals and conferences Last updated on November 11, 2025
